title: A novel algorithmic multi-attribute decision-making framework for solar panel selection using modified aggregations of cubic intuitionistic fuzzy hypersoft set
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Muhammad Sajid, Khuram Ali Khan, Atiqe Ur Rahman, Sanaa A. Bajri, Alhanouf Alburaikan, Hamiden Abd El-Wahed Khalifa
